DOC.brief_summary: A meal rich very-long chain omega-3 fatty acid oleic acid may lower postprandial insulin level comparison meal rich linoleic acid palmitic acid . A meal rich long-chain omega-3 fatty acid may lower postprandial triglyceride level compare fatty acid .
DOC.brief_title: Lipid , Glycemic , Insulin Responses Meals Rich Different Fatty Acids
DOC.detailed_description: Research Design Methods : Test meal rich palmitic acid , linoleic acid , oleic acid , eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) docosahexaenoic acid ( DHA ) contain 1,000 kcal administer randomized cross-over design every 3 4 day 11 patient T2DM . Serum insulin , glucose , triglycerides concentration measure 360 minute . All subject receive isoenergic diet constant composition throughout study .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus insulin therapy Thyroid , renal , hepatic disease , uncontrolled hypertension , anemia , history ketosis
